issues.description: The readinessProbe periodSeconds value is set to a string 'five' instead of an integer. This will cause a deployment failure as Kubernetes expects numerical values for probe intervals.
Database credentials (-dbuser/-dbpwd) are exposed in plaintext within container arguments. This violates Kubernetes best practices for sensitive data handling and poses operational risks.
issues.recommendation: Store credentials in a Kubernetes Secret and reference via environment variables

issues.description: Explicitly naming pod templates in Deployments is unnecessary and potentially confusing since pod names are generated dynamically by the controller.

content.scoreCriteria: Base score: 100. Deductions: Critical (-25) for invalid probe causing deployment failure, High (-15) for sensitive data exposure, Low (-5) for unnecessary configuration. Total: 60

apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: orionld-db-secret
type: Opaque
stringData:
  username: "usuariozão"
  password: "123456789"
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fiware-orionld
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: orionld
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: orionld
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: orion
        image: fiware/orion-ld
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: "100m"
            memory: "100Mi"
          limits:
            cpu: "500m"
            memory: "500Mi"
        args: ["-dbhost", "orionld-mongodb-svc:27017", "-rplSet", "orionld-mongodb", "-dbuser", "$(DB_USER)", "-dbpwd", "$(DB_PASSWORD)", "-dbAuthMech", "SCRAM-SHA-256", "-db", "orion", "-statCounters", "-statSemWait", "-statTiming", "-statNotifQueue"]
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1026
        env:
        - name: ORIONLD_MONGOCONLY
          value: "TRUE"
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: orionld-db-secret
              key: username
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: orionld-db-secret
              key: password
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /version
            port: 1026
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /version
            port: 1026
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: fiware-orionld-service
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 1027
      targetPort: 1026
  selector:
    app: orionld
---
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: fiware-orionld-hpa
spec:
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: fiware-orionld
  minReplicas: 3
  maxReplicas: 15
  metrics:
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        type: Utilization
        averageUtilization: 30
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        type: Utilization
        averageUtilization: 70
